description: From a trade name, presumably line +‎ -o- +‎ type.

entries.meaning: A form of typesetting machine in which a complete line of characters is set at once.
The slug produced by such a machine, or matter composed in such lines.

verbs.description: linotype (third-person singular simple present linotypes, present participle linotyping, simple past and past participle linotyped)

entries.meaning: To prepare (printed matter) using a linotype machine.
